name: Astoria Legends
description:
Follow Cybela, ex-captain of a defunct rebel force known as Magna Carta. Cybela journeys to reunite the fractured kingdoms and usher in a new era free of the tyranny of the gods known as Astrals, a dream that saw the ruin of the great Old Kings.

Astoria Legends is a 2D Character Action Hack'n'Slash title. Own the battlefield with a dance of steel and magic as you journey through the kingdom known as Elnath to reunite the fractured regions against the Astrals. Ignite the flames of rebellion and usher in a world of freedom. 

As you defeat powerful gods and their followers you earn new weapon to mold and customize your own playstyle. From golden spears that transforms into shields to phantom swords, defeat your enemies in the most stylish way as possible!

Follow the developers: https://twitter.com/skyartxv

Join our Discord! http://discord.gg/Bt3MeYw
